preActions.script:
xcrun simctl --set ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices/{}/data/Containers/Shared/SystemGroup/systemgroup.com.apple.configurationprofiles/Library/ConfigurationProfiles/UserSettings.plist
xcrun simctl --set ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices/{}/data/Library/UserConfigurationProfiles/EffectiveUserSettings.plist
xcrun simctl --set ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/XCTestDevices/{}/data/Library/UserConfigurationProfiles/PublicInfo/PublicEffectiveUserSettings.plist
xcrun simctl list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/CoreSimulator/Devices/{}/data/Containers/Shared/SystemGroup/systemgroup.com.apple.configurationprofiles/Library/ConfigurationProfiles/UserSettings.plist
xcrun simctl list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/CoreSimulator/Devices/{}/data/Library/UserConfigurationProfiles/EffectiveUserSettings.plist
xcrun simctl list devices | grep -E "Booted" | sed -E 's/.*\(([A-F0-9-]+)\).*/\1/'| xargs -I {} plutil -replace restrictedBool.allowPasswordAutoFill.value -bool NO ~/Library/Developer/CoreSimulator/Devices/{}/data/Library/UserConfigurationProfiles/PublicInfo/PublicEffectiveUserSettings.plist
preActions.name: Disable Password Autofill
